import React from "react"; import '../style/topbar.css' import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export const Navbar = () => { const username = useSelector((state)=> state.user.username); const user = false; return (
  • {username}
  • Blog
  • Write
  • Update
  • {user && Logout }
{ user ? ( <> Pablo ) : (
LOGIN SIGN UP
) }
); };
